author: bago
msg: Testing enviroment "mocking" javamail transport, dnsserver and the outgoingspool in order to test RemoteDelivery behaviours (JAMES-844)

The testing environment expectes the tested class to support "implementation specific" SMTPTransport and SMTPExceptions and uses its own implementation in the org.apache.james.transport.remotedeliverytester package.

author: bago
